line_1: Be these your arts, ye brave, these only are humane.
line_2: And learn the rich possession to maintain,

line_1: Be these your arts, ye brave, these only are humane.
line_2: Not to be mov'd by Fear or Pleasure's train;

line_1: Sharp sorrows sting the breast humane,
line_2: And hopes are false, and wishes vain.
The wretch you punish, while you share his pain.

line_1: "Yes, thou hast friends, the godlike and humane
What Nature pictures to the Breast humane.
line_2: Forbear, my Muse; know Art attempts in vain,
